group.name: Is Laptop
group.description: Step in this group will only run if the client is a Desktop

group.name: Is Desktop
group.description: Step in this group will only run if the client is a Desktop

expression.variable: Select * from Win32_ComputerSystem where PCSystemType= "3" or PCSystemType= "1" or PCSystemType= "6"

group.name: Is Server
group.description: Step in this group will only run if the client is a Server

expression.variable: Select * from Win32_ComputerSystem where PCSystemType = "4" or PCSystemType = "7" or PCSystemType = "5"
